name: Bengbo
description:
Simple, challenging and robotic? Very much so! Go wild in the casino, upgrade yourself, and experience the future of Swedish culture!



It is simple, use dice and never die! With many dice-oriented mechanics at your disposal you can battle your way up the ranks against a variety of different enemies and bosses in the Deéjude Arena, how far will you come?





In the Premium Casino Lounge, you can upgrade, gamble as well as interact with the chatty customers and quality staff! Purchase new abilities and accept or deny the latest deals that will be available to you after a battle.
